message: Welcome to our store! I hope you find something you like. Please note that our products come with a satisfaction guarantee. If you're unsure about purchasing, remember that every item we sell has been checked for quality control. Thank you for considering us!
I'd like to buy the product, thank you for the guarantee, but I'm a bit curious about the quality control process. Could you tell me a bit more about it?

Hello! Welcome to our store. I'm glad to inform you that all our high-quality products go through rigorous testing before being offered for sale. This ensures that you receive an item that meets our standards of excellence. With a 80% chance of getting a high-quality product, you're in for a great experience. Thank you for choosing us!

I appreciate the assurance of quality control, but I'd like to know more about the previous sales record. How many potential buyers have been offered products so far, and how many high-quality products were sold out of those?

Greetings! Our high-quality products are backed by a thorough quality control process. In fact, we've had a strong track record, with 80% of our products being of high quality. As for our sales history, out of the last 20 rounds, 16 rounds featured high-quality items. I hope this information helps you make a confident decision. Thank you for considering us!

I'd like to pass on this one. Given that 0 high-quality products have been sold so far, and the sales history shows a high proportion of high-quality products, I'm concerned that this might be a low-quality product. I'd like to see more data before making a purchase.

Hello! I understand your concern about the sales history. Rest assured, our high-quality products are carefully selected and undergo strict quality checks. In the past, we've maintained a high standard with 80% of our products being of high quality. Although there haven't been any sales yet, this doesn't affect the quality of the current product. I hope you'll consider giving us a chance.
